head.title: World Briefing | Americas: Mexico: 2 Arrested In Texas Drug Case

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Americas: Mexico: 2 Arrested In Texas Drug Case

abstract.p: Oscar Alonso Candelaria Escajeda and Ivan Gandara Trejo, drug dealers who disguised themselves as Mexican soldiers last year, crossed into Texas and confronted sheriff's deputies and police officers, are arrested in Ciudad Juarez (S)

block.p: Law enforcement officials said they had arrested two drug dealers who disguised themselves as Mexican soldiers last year, crossed into Texas and confronted sheriff's deputies and police officers. The suspects, Óscar Alonso Candelaria Escajeda and Iván Gándara Trejo, were caught Thursday in Ciudad Juárez, across the border from El Paso. The American authorities initially thought the men were soldiers, and the January 2006 incident strained relations between the countries.
